  },
  "description":
    "Follow the adventures of a young monkey-tailed boy named Goku as he embarks on a journey to collect the seven mystical Dragon Balls. Along the way, he meets Bulma, Master Roshi, and other unforgettable characters in the beginning of this legendary manga series.",

        "title": "1% Lifesteal: A LitRPG",
        "author": "Robert Blaise",
        "description": "In a world of countless enemies, Freddy's unique power will help him thrive.\n\nFreddy Stern, a twenty-one-year-old cashier, has lived a plain, albeit harsh life. But when he awakens in a new world, one governed by game-like mechanics, he discovers a unique ability: 1% lifesteal. As he navigates this perilous realm, Freddy must learn to harness his power, face formidable foes, and uncover the secrets of his new reality.",
